entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 08:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 15 cm except 25 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
